articles.title: Google's Bard and Bing AI Already Citing Each Other in Neural Hall of Mirrors - Futurism
articles.description: Microsoft's Bing Chat just cited misinformation generated by Google's Bard chatbot, just one day after Bard was released. Oof.
articles.content:
We hate this timeline.
Cursed Ping Pong
